name: XXX DAYS
description:
a 2D adventure/survival game

Story:

In an apocalyptic world, your only chance of survival is to find an airplane in order to reach the safe zone.

Can you find it before you run out of food/water/gasoline?

Controls:

Move--------------------------------WASD

Point/Shoot------------------------Mouse

Other Info:

Your thirst will lower each day

Cars contain gasoline and ammo

Boxes contain food, water, and ammo

Trucks contain gears

Trees contain wood

Rocks contain stones

Look at the stats and fuel amount of each location, choose wisely

Check what materials you need to upgrade

If you die, you won't lose your upgrades but you will lose all of your materials
